name: CommunityRadioPlus
0:

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: community radio plus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Community radio’s official app allows you to stream live radio from over 300 stations across Australia to your mobile device, giving you instant access to diverse content including specialist music, a variety of podcasts and news bulletins that deliver local, national, and international stories. For a list of community radio stations, click here: https://www.cbaa.org.au/about/our-members

Alongside your favourite station, discover independent radio by community from for community – from First Nations, to youth, seniors, faith-based, LGTBQIA+, multicultural, regional and diverse arts, music and cultural communities.

Discover diverse stories and new favourite podcasts from a variety on offer, including wellbeing, arts, current affairs, science and technology, astronomy, health/medical, community service, sports, book and movie reviews, and more.

To use the skill, you will be asked to set a four digit Australian postcode. This will help the skill match stations according to the general location for this postcode.

---
Disclaimer: The Health/Medical information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
